name: Nedder Park
description:
Nedder Park: a place in space where you catch bugs, and avoid mosquitoes.
Hold your net back, and let go to catch!
It's a pleasant time. If you want a challenge - how quickly can you grab 1,000 points?
Enjoy!

Oh, you're still reading? Well! Here's a fun fact, if you hadn't realised: 
The red bugs travel the slowest, and the pink travel the fastest. That's because pink bugs are worth more! Make sure to catch them quick, though, or they'll fly off.

Actually, there is three types of buggers worth more than the pink bugs. I hear they look a bit buttery, eggy, and chocolatey. I don't know what that means, but they definitely exist! Maybe you can catch them!

And watch out for those pesky electric mosquitoes! Just touching them will over your game!

Thanks for playing!
JamerTheGamer
